title: VA Life Styles - Compiled By Laurent Garnier FLAC
description:
I&#039;m behind the Great Firewall / Golden Shield (China) and torrents tend to run a little slow and quirky. 

Be patient. This will get seeded though it may take up to two days.

This is one of the greatest compilations I&#039;ve had the pleasure to listen to. Every track has a unique quality that sets it apart from the genre it has grown from.

Tracklist
=========

2 	George McCrae 	       I Get Lifted

13 	QPSM Unit 	       Brooklyn Inferno Quadraphonic

 <a href="
http://www.discogs.com/release/395684" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.discogs.com/release/395684</a>

Lock Groove - Great track from the New York &#039;No Wave&#039; scene. A combination of latin vibes and experimental white boy punk.

Samba - One of the most dense and uplifting pieces of latin music you&#039;re likely to hear. Accessable Jazz percussion that will have you groovin.

Funkier than a... One of the finest Nina tracks ever to hit wax. Full of soul and funk with groans that only she could pull off.

I first heard The End remix on an Optimo (uk) mix and was surprised to find it here. Before, I had always thought it was one of their own re-edits.

I could go on and on about how great each of these tracks is but I&#039;ll just leave you to have a listen for yourself.
